pageProps.title: What are some popular software tools used to create tilesets for 2D games?
pageProps.metaDesc: Tilesets are a key component in 2D game development. They provide the building blocks for game environments, allowing developers to create levels, backgrounds, and objects. There are a variety of software tools available for creating tilesets, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. In this article, we will take a look at some of the most popular software tools used to create tilesets for 2D games.
